Preferences

The Preferences window contains the following configuration parameters:

Alerts ON by default

Set the default status of alerts

Device data can be edited

Allow users to edit device data

Real-time data can be edited after validation

Allow users to edit validated real-time data

Log on required to start new session

Require a log-on to start a new session

Application closes between patients

Configure application to exit between patients

Prompt for confirmation when exiting application

Prompt users for confirmation when quitting an application

Prompt to transfer/discharge patient after printout

Transfer or discharge patient after printing

Prompt to discontinue orders when transferring patient OUT

Prompt users to discontinue orders when transferring a patient

Prompt to discontinue orders when transferring patient IN

Prompt users to discontinue orders when transferring a patient

Apply access rights when discontinuing orders during patient transfers

Prompt users to discontinue orders when transferring a patient

Open Demographics on patient transfer/discharge

Display the Demographics window when ending a session

Print on transfer/discharge

Print when transferring or discharging a patient

Acknowledgement of new orders required

Add or remove the New Orders icon

Display Care Beacon

Add or remove the Care Beacon
